casebody.data:
Cleveland Bar Association v. Johnson.

[Cite as Cleveland Bar Assn. v. Johnson (1998), 81 Ohio St.3d 74.]

(No. 97-1755 Submitted October 7, 1997 Decided February 18, 1998.) *75Joseph G. Schneider and Erica L. Eversman, for relator. *76 Per Curiam.

We agree with the findings, conclusions, and recommendation of the board. Respondent is hereby indefinitely suspended from the practice of law in Ohio. Costs taxed to respondent.

Judgment accordingly.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
